title: Frontend Developer
description: Responsible for implementing visual elements that users see and interact with in a web application.
requirements: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
education: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent

title: Backend Developer
description: Develop and maintain the server-side logic and APIs for web applications.
education: Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science or related field

title: UI/UX Designer
description: Design user-centered experiences and interfaces for digital products.
requirements: Proficiency in Figma or Adobe XD
education: Diploma or Degree in Design, Fine Arts, or related field

title: Data Scientist
description: Analyze and interpret complex data to help companies make better decisions.
requirements: Strong programming skills in Python or R
education: Master's Degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Responsible for managing deployment pipelines and automating infrastructure processes.
requirements: Familiarity with cloud platforms like AWS or Azure
education: Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or related field

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Develop and maintain mobile applications for iOS and Android platforms.
requirements: Proficiency in Flutter or React Native
education: Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering or related field

title: Digital Marketing Specialist
description: Plan and execute digital marketing campaigns to enhance online presence.
requirements: Proficiency in Google Ads and Analytics
education: Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business, or related field

title: Cloud Architect
description: Design and manage cloud infrastructure for enterprise applications.
education: Master's Degree in Computer Science or equivalent

title: AI/ML Engineer
description: Develop and deploy machine learning models for various applications.
requirements: Proficiency in Python, TensorFlow, or PyTorch
education: Master's Degree in AI/ML, Data Science, or related field

title: System Administrator
description: Manage and maintain IT infrastructure, including servers and networks.
requirements: Experience with Linux and Windows Server
education: Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or related field
